name: JDBC Operations Without Retry
description: You are verifying that database operations are resilient to transient failures. A violation occurs if a method uses JdbcTemplate, EntityManager, or JpaRepository but does not have retry logic (like @Retryable or Resilience4j). Database calls can fail temporarily; without retries, these errors impact availability.

remediation.quickFix: Add @Retryable annotation with appropriate maxAttempts and backoff
remediation.explanation: Use Spring Retry or Resilience4j to automatically retry failed database operations.
